Indicator name: Proportion of population aged 65 or over
Notes: The data is taken from a table that includes unrounded 5 year age bands by LSOA. There is some calculation involved, particularly in summing up multiple year age bands, and identifying the proportion of the total population aged 65+.

Indicator name: Proportion of population in approximated social grade DE
Notes: This data is taken from a table showing approximated social grades. The proportion is calculated by dividing the numbers in social grade DE by the total population.
